tool_description: Extracts and analyzes keyword frequencies from review text, identifying common themes, phrases, and topics mentioned by customers.

review_ids.description: List of review IDs to analyze for keywords

min_word_length.description: Minimum length of words to include in analysis

max_keywords.description: Maximum number of top keywords to return

exclude_stopwords.description: Whether to exclude common stopwords from analysis

include_phrases.description: Whether to include 2-3 word phrases in analysis

case_sensitive.description: Whether keyword matching should be case sensitive

error_messages: Empty review data: review_ids array cannot be empty
Invalid word length: min_word_length must be a positive integer
Invalid keyword limit: max_keywords must be between 1 and 1000
Text processing error: Unable to process text from one or more reviews
Insufficient text data: Reviews contain insufficient text for meaningful keyword analysis
usage: Provide review IDs and configure analysis parameters such as minimum word length and whether to include phrases. Returns ranked keywords and their frequencies.

top_keywords.description: Most frequently mentioned keywords in descending order

keyword_frequencies.description: Frequency counts corresponding to each top keyword

total_words_analyzed.description: Total number of words processed in the analysis
